gr.interamerican.bo2.odftoolkit
Class OdfToolkitTextDocument

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.odftoolkit.OdfToolkitTextDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
BusinessDocument
public class OdfToolkitTextDocument
extends Object
implements BusinessDocument

Implementation of BusinessDocument based on OdfToolkit. This solution is based on a basic assumption. Each document should be organized in sections. The insertAt(String,BusinessDocument) and append(BusinessDocument) methods are based on this assumption.

setFields

public void setFields(Object model)
               throws DocumentEngineException
Description copied from interface: BusinessDocument
Sets the values of the document's fields from an object.
The method uses the name of each field as an OGNL expression. This expression gets the value for the specified user defined field.

Specified by:
